title: Kane's Late Heartbreak
description:
The FC crew recap Tottenham's dramatic finish against Sporting, which saw a late goal chalked off for offsides, and review Atletico Madrid's late penalty miss which sees them eliminated form the Champions League. Plus, the panel dive into the heavy cost of Barcelona's Champions League elimination and question what it means for Xavi going forward.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Tottenham have a late goal chalked off against Sporting; Atletico Madrid eliminated after missed penalty; The cost of Barcelona's UCL failure
